definition: the world of the living
positive (electric.)/sun/male principle (Taoism)/Yang, opposite: 陰|阴[yin1]
between/among/within a definite time or space/room/section of a room or lateral space between two pairs of pillars/classifier for rooms
gap/to separate/to thin out (seedlings)/to sow discontent

sentences.english: Let me infuse him with my life-force and awaken him to the world of the living!
